GSD37gautdhcu:5: kriyate 'dya mayā bhāṣyaṃ sūnunā vāmanasya tu //
GSD37gautdhcu:12: athavā-puruṣasya sukhaduḥkhopabhogārthaiḥ śarīrendriyaviṣayaiḥ saṃyogaviyogarūpo janmajarāmaraṇaprabandhaḥ saṃsāraḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:15: tadubhayamaparijñāne na sambhavatīti dharmādharmasvarūpāvabodhanārthaṃ gautamena śāstraṃ praṇītamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:27: tasya svata eva siddheḥ anyathā yena prāmāṇyaṃ pratipādyate tasyāpyanyena prāmāṇyaṃ tasyāpyanyenetyanavasthā syāditi //
GSD37gautdhcu:30: ceducyate-vedavacanāduccaritāttatpadārthavidāṃ viśiṣṭer'the yā pratipattirniḥsaṃdigdhā jāyate na ca kālāntare deśāntare puruṣāntare 'vasthāntare vā viparyeti sā dharmamūlamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:31: yacca niḥsaṃdigdhamaviparītaṃ ca jñānamutpadyate tasya prāmāṇyamadhyavasituṃ śakyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:34: kartṛgato hi doṣaḥ śabdajanitasya pratyayasya mithyātvamāpādayati /
GSD37gautdhcu:36: idānīṃ sūtraṃ vibrīyate-tatra vedo mantrabrāhmaṇākhyo grantharāśiḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:41: śrutiśtu vedo vijñeyo dharmaśāstraṃ tu vai smṛtiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:49: tatra vidhipratiṣedhātmako hi vedo dharmādyavabodhakatvaṃ pratipadyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:50: na tu mantrārthavādarūpa iti ceducyate- arthavādāderapi vidhyekavākyatvenopakārakatvāt pāraṃparyeṇa dharmamūlatvamaviruddham /
GSD37gautdhcu:58: ā haiva sa nakhāgrebhyaḥ paramaṃ tapyate tapaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:72: dharmaḥ pañcaprakāraḥ-varṇadharma āśramadharmo guṇadharmo varṇāśramadharmo nimittadharma iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:79: sūtrārambhaprayojanaṃ ca-yathaiva vedo dharmamūlaṃ tathā smṛtiśīle apīti //
GSD37gautdhcu:80: na kevalaṃ veda eva dharmamūlaṃ, kiṃ tarhi-
GSD37gautdhcu:82: vedavidāṃ ca ye smṛtiśīle te api dharmamūle bhavataḥ te api vedāvirodhinī,
GSD37gautdhcu:99: ācārātmatuṣṭī api śīla evāntarbhūte iti na pṛthagupanyaste /
GSD37gautdhcu:101: idānīṃ pūrvapakṣīkaroti vedavidāṃ śīlaṃ dharmamūlaṃ na bhavati yataḥ-
GSD37gautdhcu:108: atrāpi dharmamūlatvaṃ na prāpnotīti śeṣaḥ caśabdopādānāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:111: tena śāstraṃ lokasaṃvyavahāraṃ cānavekṣya yat kriyate tat sāhasam /
GSD37gautdhcu:123: dṛṣṭārtho dṛṣṭaprayojanaḥ tasmin dṛṣṭaprayojane śīlaṃ dharmamūlaṃ na bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:128: tasmin gṛhyamāṇe“īdudet“ityādinā pragṛhyasaṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ“dṛṣṭārthe avaradaurbalyāt“iti pāṭhaḥ prāpnoti /
GSD37gautdhcu:129: avaradaurbalyāt na varaḥ avaro nikṛṣṭaḥ dveṣādyabhibhūtaḥ aparamārthajñāna ityarthaḥ tasya daurbalyāt dharmādharmaparijñānāśakterityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:130: etaccānena jñāpitaṃ bhavati- mahatāmapi tadvidāṃ kadā cidabhibhavo 'stīti,
GSD37gautdhcu:137: evaṃ smṛtipramāṇamuktvā adhunā ekārthopanipatitānāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparavirodhe sati kiṃ kravyamityāta āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:152: nanu-cātra sārmathyādeva vikalpaprasiddheḥ anarthakamidaṃ sūtraṃ samuccayastāvadatra na saṃbhatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:153: na hyanudite hutvā punarudite hotuṃ śakyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:168: evaṃ smṛtyācāravirodhe ca mātuladuhitṛpariṇayanādyācāro bādhyata iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:171: avirodhe tu tulyapramāṇaśiṣṭānāṃ samuccayaḥ yathā ācamanādīnāṃ śrauteṣu karmasviti //
GSD37gautdhcu:172: nanu ca yadi vedaliṅgaprabhavatvābhyupagama eva smṛteḥ śrutyā sahātulyabalatvamupapādyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:173: tadā hi mantrārthavādavākyeṣvanyapareṣvapi yāni smārtadharmamabalabhūtāni liṅgāni“kumārā
GSD37gautdhcu:174: viśikhā iva“ityevamādīni teṣāṃ pratyakṣavedavākyavirodhe sati virodhivākyānumānavirodhāt
GSD37gautdhcu:176: yadā tūtsannaśākhāpūrvikā smṛtirabhyupagame-yathā'hāpastambaḥ-“brāhmaṇoktā vidhayasteṣāmutsannāḥ pāṭhāḥ prayogādanumīyante“iti tadobhayośca vaidikatvāt tulyabalataiva prasajyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:177: na hyanumitasya vedavākyasya pratyakṣasya ca balābalaviśeṣo 'sti pratyakṣānumānaparicchinnāgnivaditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:178: syādetat yatra smṛtivacane vedavirodho 'sti tannaiva vedavākyānumāpakaṃ bhavati,
GSD37gautdhcu:182: yadāpi vedavadavicchinnapāraṃparyeṇāgatā smṛtirabhyupagamyate tadāpi tulyabalatvamupapadyata iti tatrāpi tannaivopapadyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:183: yastāvanmātuladuhitṛpariṇayanādikaḥ samācāra upanyastaḥ sa kāmādyabhibhave sati duṣṭācāratvācchiṣṭācāra eva nopapadyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:184: yastvavigānenoktalakṣaṇaiḥ śiṣṭairācaryate tasya vedamūlatvāviśeṣāt smṛtyā saha tulyabalatvameva prāpnoti /
GSD37gautdhcu:186: na ca samācārasya smṛtivākyāntaritarūpsaya vedavākyānumānasaṃnikarṣakṛtaṃ balābalatvaṃ sidhyati //
GSD37gautdhcu:188: yadi hi tulyabalānyetāni syuḥ tadā virodhe vikalpaḥ sārmathyādeva siddhaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:195: sa pakṣaḥ“tadvidāṃ ca smṛtiśīle“ityetasmin sati durupapāda eveti /
GSD37gautdhcu:198: kvacit smṛtyā śruterbādhadarśanāt yathā sāmānyena pravṛtto vaidikakarmādhikāraḥ smṛtyā upanītādipuruṣaviśeṣa evādhikriyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:200: tathā gāmālabheteti śruticodito 'pi govadhaḥ smārtapratiṣedhabalīyastvānna kriyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:201: tathāgnihotrādikaṃ coditajīvanopādhikaṃ karma dravyasādhyamapi na smārtacauryādipratiṣaddhenāpi dravyamārjayitvā tatkriyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:204: yatra tu virodhābhāvaḥ tatra durbalopi naiva bādhyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:205: yastāvadupanītasya karmādhikāraḥ saḥ śrutyā naiva virudhyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:209: yaccoktaṃ govardhestu śruticoditopi na kriyata iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:211: kintu mantravarṇācca 'mā gāḥ pramāpayāśvān pramāpaya'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:215: tatra vicāryate-kiṃ smaraṇātpūrvameva naṣṭāḥ śākhāḥ utottarakālamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:222: āpastamboktasyāpyayamabhiprāyaḥ-utsannāḥ kvacitkvaciddeśe na sarvatreti 'teṣāmutsannāḥ pāṭhāḥ prayogādanumīyante';
GSD37gautdhcu:227: vedasya agnerācāryasya yamaniyamānāṃ vā samīpe nayanamupanayanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:233: na ca dvijatvavat brāhmaṇatvaṃ kriyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:237: kāmyaṃ tu brāhmaṇasya navame pañcame vā syāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:244: pañcame navama iti vācye kramabhedaḥ anayorantarā kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ kāmyakālaparigrahārthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:248: tathācaca smṛtyantaraṃ-'navame tvāyuṣmākaṃ pañcame brahmavarcasakāmam'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:272: alpaṃ vā bahu vā yasya śrutasyopakaroti yaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:290: yadā tu nityakāmyayoḥ kenaciddurbhikṣādinā nimittenātikramaḥ syāt tadānīmāpatkalpamāha-
GSD37gautdhcu:307: dvābhyāmadhikābhyāṃ sahitā yā dvāviṃśatiḥ sā dvyadhikāḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:322: mauñjī trivṛt samā ślakṣṇā kāryā viprasya mekhalā /
GSD37gautdhcu:323: kṣatriyasya tu maurvī jyā vaiśyasya śaṇatāntavī //
GSD37gautdhcu:345: viṣamasaṅkhyatvādeva sarveṣāṃ siddheḥ smṛtyantare 'śāṇaṃ kṣaumaṃ vāso brāhmaṇasya';
GSD37gautdhcu:346: iti tadāśritya yadyathāsaṅkhyaṃ tannivṛttyarthaṃ sarveṣāṃ grahaṇaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:377: yajñārhe vā syāt vibhītakabilvakayāvakādirvarjito vṛkṣaviśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:407: śikhā eva jaṭā yasya sa śikhājaṭaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:409: cakāro vār'thaḥ pratyekamabhisambadhyate-muṇḍo vā jaṭilo vā śikhājaṭo veti /
GSD37gautdhcu:413: muṇḍo vā jaṭilo vā syādasya vā syācchikhājaṭaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:417: brāhmaṇabhojanādau pravṛtto dravyahastaḥ pūrvamanucchiṣṭaḥ kenacitkāraṇenocchiṣṭasparśādaprayato bhavati,
GSD37gautdhcu:426: yattu dravyasya smṛtyantare prokṣaṇamukta-'bhūmau nikṣipya prokṣaṇāddravyaṃ śuddhyati';
GSD37gautdhcu:428: kathaṃ punastulyasaṃhite sūtre viśeṣo 'vagamyate-nidhāyācacamanaṃ na punaranidhāyeti /
GSD37gautdhcu:447: tejasā hetubhūtena yāni kriyante tāni taijasāni sauvarṇādīni /
GSD37gautdhcu:450: tathā cauśanasaṃ-'taijasānāṃ mūtrapurīṣaretaḥ kuṇapopahatānāṃ āvartanamullekhanaṃ bhasmanā triḥ saptakṛtvaḥ parimārjanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:469: dāravāṇāṃ āsanaśayanādīnāṃ aṇedhyādyupahatānāṃ takṣaṇaṃ tanūkaraṇaṃ yāvanmātramupahatam /
GSD37gautdhcu:495: bhūmiḥ, gṛhādiḥ dāruvaditi prakṛtidravyeṇātideśaṃ bruvan etat jñāpayati-yat vikārasya śocamucyate prakṛtidravyasyāpi tadeva bhavatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:512: yathālepaṃ vikalpena samuccayena vā śaucaṃ kartavyam //
GSD37gautdhcu:515: vidalaḥ vaṃśamayūrapakṣādiniṣpannaḥ carma vyāghracarmādi teṣāmaspṛśyaspṛṣṭānāṃ celavat vastravacchaucam /
GSD37gautdhcu:533: evaṃ ca pādaprakṣālanādikamapi taddigabhimukha eva kuryāditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:536: śucau deśa āsīno dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ jānvantarā kṛtvā yajñopavītyā maṇibandhātpāṇī prakṣālya vāgyato hṛdayaspṛśastriścaturvāpa ācāmet // Gaut_1.38
GSD37gautdhcu:540: tathā ca vakhiṣṭhaḥ- 'prakṣālya pādau pāṇo cā maṇibandhanāt'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:542: tathāca vasiṣṭhaḥ-'vrajan tiṣṭhan śayānaḥ praṇato vā nācāmet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:545: yadi kadācit ayajñopavīti bhūtvāpyāste tathāpyācamane avaśyaṃ yajñopavītinā bhavitavyamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:546: tathā cāpaspambaḥ-'upāsane gurūṇāṃ vṛddhānāmatithīnāṃ home japyakarmaṇi bhojana ācamane svādhyāye ca yajñopavīti syāt'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:560: abgrahaṇaṃ gomūtrādinivṛttyarthaṃ teṣāṃ śuddhihetutvasāmānyādgrahaṇaṃ mā bhūditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:563: tatra tūśanā'ha- 'dakṣiṇaṃ hastatalaṃ gokarṇākāraṃ vinyasya brāhmeṇa tīrthenāśabdaṃ pibedṛgyajuḥsāmavedān dhyāyan'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:570: tatra tūktaṃ kaṇvena-'atharvavedetihāsapurāṇāni dhyāyan brāhmeṇa tīrthenoṣṭhayoḥ salomapradeśaṃ mṛjyāt'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:584: candrādityau dhyātvā tata upaspṛśya tarjanyaṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ nāsikāvakāśau prāṇān dhyātvā
GSD37gautdhcu:585: tata upaspṛśya kaniṣṭhikāṅguṣṭhābhyāṃ karṇau diśo dhyātvā tata upaspṛśyāṅguṣṭhena
GSD37gautdhcu:588: mūrdhani cet vaktavye dadyāditi grahaṇaṃ sarvāṅgulyartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:589: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ 'sarvāṅgulibhiḥ śriyaṃ dhyātvā mūrdhani prakṣipet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:591: tathā ca vasiṣṭhaḥ-'mūrdhani ca dadyātsavye pāṇau'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:593: iti smṛtyantarābhidhānāt strīśūdrayośca sakṛtpānāt sakṛdoṣṭhasparśanācca śuddhirdraṣṭavyā atrānuktāpi //
GSD37gautdhcu:596: suptvā bhuktvā kṣutvā ca punaḥ // Gaut_1.43 //
GSD37gautdhcu:599: tathā ca vasiṣṭhaḥ- 'suptvā bhuktvā kṣutvā snātvā pītvā ruditvā cācāntaḥ punarācāmet'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:600: tatra kṣutasyāniyatakālatvāt ādāvaśakyamācamanamiti cet tatrāpi nityaprāyatyārtha ārambhaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:603: atastatrādāvante cācamanaṃ kuryāt tatra bhojane kecidādāvapi dvirācamanamicchanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:606: 'suptvā bhuktvā kṣutvā snātvā pītvā ruditvā cācāntaḥ punarācāmeddvi'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:607: evaṃ ca bhojane ādāvante cca dvirācamanaṃ svāpādāvekamante ca dviḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:615: satyapi jihvābhimarśane yāvat svasthānānna cyavanti tāvacchucirityeke manyante //
GSD37gautdhcu:617: cyuteṣu āsye yajjalaṃ tadāsrāve yadvadvijātīyāt tannigiran śucacireva bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:621: kutaḥ cyuteṣu nigiran śuciriti vaktavye āsrāvavadvidyādityārambhāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:626: yathocchiṣṭāvayavo bahirbhūtaḥ aśucitvamāpādayati tadvadāsrāvasyāpi prāpta āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:627: na mukhyā vipruṣa ucchiṣṭaṃ kurvanti na cedaṅge nipatanti // Gaut_1.47 //
GSD37gautdhcu:628: mukhe bhavā mukhyāḥ vipruṣa āsrābāvayavāḥ te mantrayamāṇasya vinirgatā nāprāyatyaṃ janayanti yadyaṅge stanodarādau na nipatanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:629: niśabdo niścayārthaḥ ato niścayena yadyaṅge patanti tadānīmevocchiṣṭaṃ janayanti nāśaṅkāmātreṇeti /
GSD37gautdhcu:634: lepagandhayorapanayane kṛte amedhyaliptasya amedhyasambaddhasya śucitvaṃ bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:638: śleṣmāśru dūṣikā svedo dvādaśaite nṛṇāṃ malāḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:641: śaucādhikāre punaḥ śaucagrahaṇaṃ taijasādīnāmapi lepagandhāpanayanayādeva śaucamityevamartham //
GSD37gautdhcu:647: tadadbhirmṛdā ceti vaktavye pūrvagrahaṇaṃ yatra nātīva lepo lakṣyate tatrādbhireva śasaucamityevamarthaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:652: athavā yatra yatra śaucamuktaṃ tatra tatrādbhireva śaucaṃ prathamaṃ kāryamityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:653: yathā mṛdā adbhiriti samuccīyate tathā bhasmādibhirapi samuccayārtho visamāsaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:654: taisajādīnāṃ dravyāṇāmuktatvāt idaṃ śaucaṃ śarīrāvayavasyāmedhyaliptasya draṣṭavyam //
GSD37gautdhcu:662: ityanena siddhatvāt lepagandhāpakarṣaṇaṃ ca mṛtsalilaprakṣālanena kuryāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:664: ityatra yaduktaṃ cūrṇādinā annalepāpakarṣaṇaṃ tenāśakyamidaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:668: kathaṃ-tadgrahaṇenānnalepāpakarṣaṇamuktaṃ tadapakarṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā tataācāmedityevamarthaṃ anyathā sandehaḥ syāditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:669: tathā cāpastambaḥ 'mūtraṃ kṛtvā pūrīṣaṃ vā mūtrapurīṣalepānannalepānucchiṣṭalepān
GSD37gautdhcu:670: retasaśca ye lepāstān prakṣālya pādau cācamya prayato bhavati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:678: sa yatra yajñaviṣaye sphyādīnāṃ prakṣālanamātrādeva śuddhiṃ vidadhyāt tatra tadeva,
GSD37gautdhcu:680: atulyabalatvādevedaṃ siddhamiti cet śrutyuktasya laukike ananupraveśanārtha upanyāsaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:681: yathār davyā yāgaviṣaye śrutyā prakṣālanena śuddhiruktā,
GSD37gautdhcu:683: darvīsāmānyena śrutyuktā mā bhūt smṛtyuktāmeva kuryādityevamarthamupanyāsaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:685: sa yatra śaucaṃ vidadhyāt tatra tadeva,
GSD37gautdhcu:687: taduktatvādevāsandeha iti cet ucyate- yasminviṣaye na kiṃciducyate tatra smṛtyantaroktaṃ bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:688: yatra lepagandhāpakarṣaṇādi kiṃciducyate tatra smṛtyantareṇa vikalpaśaṅkā bhavatīti tannirāsārthamuktaṃ 'yatra cāmnāyo vidadhyāt'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:692: pāṇinā savyamupasaṅgṛhyānaṅguṣṭhamadhīhi bho ityāmantrayeta gurum // Gaut_1.52 //
GSD37gautdhcu:693: pāṇinā dakṣiṇena savyaṃ pāṇimanaṅguṣṭhavarjitaṃ gṛhītvā adhīhi bho iti prārthayeta gurumadhyāpakam /
GSD37gautdhcu:731: savyena savyaḥ spṛṣṭavyo dakṣiṇena tu dakṣiṇaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:741: anujñāta upaviśetprāṅmukho dakṣiṇataḥ śiṣya udaṅmukho vā // Gaut_1.60 //
GSD37gautdhcu:742: ācāryeṇādiṣṭaḥ tasya dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vopaviśet saṃbhavato vikalpaḥ āsīnasyācāryasya yathā tadabhimukho bhavati tathā prāṅmukha udaṅmukho vā upaviśedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:747: iti ca niyamārthaḥ nānanujñāta upaviśennādakṣiṇata iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:754: tripadā caiva gāyatrī vijñeyā brahmaṇo mukham //
GSD37gautdhcu:770: sāvitrī cānuvacanaṃ tato 'dhīyīteti vaktavye ādito brahmaṇa ādāna ityārambhāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:777: yadyadhīyatāmantarā madhye kaścidgacchettataḥ punarapi pādopasaṅgrahaṇādipraṇavoccāraṇānto yo vidhistaṃ kuryāttasya prāyaścittārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:789: śvādīnāṃ pratyekamantarā manage tryahaṃ bhaktatyāgaḥ prāyaścittaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:812: tatastrīnprāṇāyāmān dhārayitvā ghṛtaṃ prāśyopasadanaṃ ca kṛtvādhīyīta,
GSD37gautdhcu:819: tathā cāhośanā- 'anabhisandhyā śmaśānābhyadhyayane 'dhīhi bho ityuktvādhīyīta'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:820: cakārādanantaroktasya praṇāyāmādeḥ sarvasya prāptau evaṃśabdena anantaroktasyopasadanasyaiva prāptiḥ kriyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:821: tarhyevaṃśabda eva vaktavya iti cet na,
GSD37gautdhcu:823: kathaṃ ? evaṃśabde caśabde vā vaktavye ubhayapāṭhasya prayojanāntaraṃ kalpayituṃ nyāyyaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:826: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ-'śmaśānasamīpe 'dhītya prāṇān dhārayet prāṇopasparśanamabhivādanaṃ sāvitryanuvācanaṃ'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:854: nanu ca rājadaṇḍaprāyaścittāni ca vihitākaraṇe niṣiddhasevane vā vidhīyante /
GSD37gautdhcu:857: na cāsya vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā śrūyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:862: atrocyate-yadvihitākaraṇe pratipiddhasevane vā prāyaścittamuktaṃ rājadaṇḍo vā tadubhayamasyāpi prāpnotyeva /
GSD37gautdhcu:863: yadyapyasyaivoddeśena vidhiḥ pratiṣedho vā na śrūyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:869: ityanena sūtreṇa upanayanādārabhya yo vidhirucyate-tadvyatikrame eva prāyaścittaṃ nānyavyatikrame iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:872: tathāpi nityopanayanakālātītasya bhinnabuddheḥ śaktasya ekādaśavarṣādūrdhvaṃ ṣoḍaśavarṣātprāk prāyaścittārdhapraveśanārthaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:886: tadvyatikrame bālasya sataḥ pitrādīnāṃ prāyaścittasya śravaṇāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:888: idānīṃ sūtraṃ vivriyate-upanayanātprākkāmacāra icchāgatiḥ tasmāccaṇḍālasparśanādau prokṣaṇamātraṃ vakṣyati 'avokṣaṇebhyaḥ';
GSD37gautdhcu:901: kāmavāde abhiśaṃsādau kāmabhakṣaṇe surāpānādau cātyantavālyāvasthāyāmapi yatnato nivārayitavya-,
GSD37gautdhcu:921: yathāpariveṣṭitaśirasaḥ kṛṣṭādāvapi mūtrapurīṣāvutpadyete tiṣṭhato vā tathā tatraiva kuryādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:935: asyonapañcavarṣasyāpamārjanādibhyaḥ anyatra kiñcidapi śaucaprakāraḥ na vidyata ityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:953: dvayameva prayojanaṃ śaucavidhānasya dṛśyate itarasparśayogyārthamanuṣṭhānārthaṃ ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:967: aśuciṃ spṛśate yastu eka eva hi duṣyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:968: taṃ spṛṣṭvānyo na duṣyeta sarvadravyeṣvayaṃ vidhiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:983: kāmacāritvādyatrakutracinmantramadhītyāgnihotrādau yadi svayameva pravartate tadā taṃ dṛṣṭvānumantāpi na syādityevamartha evaśabdaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:990: naiva kanyā na yuvatirnālpavidyo na bāliśaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:993: tatrālpavidyapratiṣedhādeva pratiṣedhe siddhe nāsaṃskṛta iti pratiṣedho 'nyasya viduṣo 'bhāvelpavidyasyāpi saṃskṛtasyābhyanujñānārthamiti pratipāditam
GSD37gautdhcu:997: evaṃ cāgnihavanabalirharaṇayoḥ kanyāyā api niyogapratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1001: tathā ca smṛtyantaraṃ-'patnyaupāsanaṃ juhuyādvaiśvadevaṃ ca'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1009: ityanena vedādhyayanavidhānādevānupanītasya pratiṣedhe siddhe vedasya punaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ veda eva nādhyāpayitavyaḥ iti niyamārthaḥ tataścāṅgādhyāpane na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1014: amuṣmai svadhetyuktvā yatpiṇḍodakādi pretebhyo dīyate tatsvadhāninayanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1022: upanayanādārabhya yo vidhiruktaḥ sa niyamasaṃjño bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:1024: ato vā ārabhya niyamaḥ vratadhāraṇaṃ yo vakṣyate 'gnīndhanādiḥ sa niyamaḥ upanayanādiḥ kartavyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1043: tatrāpi pradakṣiṇaṃ parītyāgnimityanena samiddhoma ukta ityuktam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1045: iti dvirbhojanaśravaṇāt sāyaṃ prātaḥ dviragnīndhanamapi draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1067: āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ vrāhyaṃ vāyavyaṃ divyameva ca //
GSD37gautdhcu:1069: āpo hiṣṭheti ca brāhmaṃ vāyavyaṃ gorajaḥ smṛtam //
GSD37gautdhcu:1070: yattu syātsātapaṃ varṣaṃ divyaṃ snānaṃ taducyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1086: godānaṃ nāma chandogānāṃ dvitīyaṃ vrataṃ anyeṣāmapi ṣoḍaśe varṣe dhārayitavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1092: eka iti vacanāt na tu gautamaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1099: bahirabhyantare vā yatra kutra cicchuddhadeśe kartavyamiti gautamamatam //
GSD37gautdhcu:1100: idānīṃ prasaṅgāt tat sandhyopāsanaṃ kadā kathaṃ ca kartavyamityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1113: paścimāṃ tu samāsīno malaṃ hanti divā kṛtam //
GSD37gautdhcu:1117: yaḥ kālo nakṣatrajyotiṣā saha vartata sa sajyotiḥ tasmin sajyotiṣi kāle ārambhaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1119: tata ā jyotiṣo darśanāt-pūrvasyāmādityadarśanāt uttarasyāṃ nakṣatradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1120: ā jyotiṣa iti vaktavye darśanagrahaṇaṃ sampagartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1123: prajñāṃ yaśaśca kīrtiṃ ca brahmavarcasameva ca //
GSD37gautdhcu:1137: tathā'hośanā-'sāyaṃ prātarudakaṃ gatvā pūto bhūtvā pavitreṇa mārjayitvā āpohiṣṭhīyābhistisṛbhirabliṅgābhiḥ vāmadevyena ca,
GSD37gautdhcu:1138: tataḥ śuco deśe darbheṣvāsīno darbhāndhārayamāṇaḥ pratyaṅmukho vāgyata ātmānaṃ dhyātvā
GSD37gautdhcu:1139: tataḥ sarecakaṣūrakakumbhakādīn trīn prāṇāyāmān dhārayitvā ṛṣicchabdodevatādhyānapūrvakaṃ
GSD37gautdhcu:1140: bhūrbhuvaḥsvarityādikāṃ sāvitrīṃ sahasrakṛtva āvartayecchatakṛtvo vā daśāvarāmathottiṣṭhamnagniyamabrahmabhyaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:1141: pratyagdakṣiṇodīcyāsu namaskṛtvā triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā punarapi pratīcīṃ diśaṃ namaskuryāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1145: yadi sandhyākālayorevāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ syāt tadānīmekameva sūtraṃ kriyeta 'tiṣṭhetpūrvāmāsītottarāṃ sajyotipyā jyotiṣo darśanādvāgyato nādityamīkṣeta'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1150: abhiprāyaśca smṛtyantarokto draṣṭavyaḥ yathā cāhośanā-'nekṣetādityaṃ sandhyāgataṃ madhyaṃdinagataṃ rāhugrastaṃ vāristham'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1158: tatrāpyāturasyauṣadhārthaṃ gurorucchiṣṭasya māṃsasya bhakṣaṇe na doṣaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1159: 'sa cedavyādhīyīta kāmaṃ gurorucchiṣṭaṃ bhaiṣajyārthe sarvaṃ prāśnīyāt';
GSD37gautdhcu:1181: viśeṣata eva lokaprasiddherna gandhasāmānyasya grahaṇaṃ bhavatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1197: harṣaḥ prītiḥ evaṃ ca taddhetūnāṃ nāṭakādīnāṃ prekṣaṇasyāpi pratiṣedhaḥ siddhaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1207: kutaḥ ? yadyācāryasyaiva grahaṇaṃ tadānīṃ ācāryadarśana iti vaktavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1209: tathāca smṛtyantaraṃ-'manyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ sakāśe saṃkucitastiṣṭhet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1219: tathā cāpastambaḥ-'na smayeta yadi smayetāpapṛhya smayeteti brāhmaṇaṃ'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1238: evaṃ ca gurorapyanurūpā sevā na kartavyā /
GSD37gautdhcu:1245: ācāryasya tatputrasya ca tadbhāryāyāśca dīkṣitasya ca saṃjñāṃ pitrādikṛtāṃ noccārayet //
GSD37gautdhcu:1252: madyaṃ guḍamadhupiṣṭakṛtaṃ anyadapi yanmadakaraṃ yatsarvaṃ brāhmaṇo nityaṃ prāgapyupanayanādvarjayet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1253: evaṃ kṣatriyavaiśyayoḥ prāgupanayanādūrdhvaṃ ca brahmacaryāt paiṣṭīvarjitāyāḥ surāyā apratiṣedhaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1256: gauḍī mādhvī ca paiṣṭī ca vijñeyā trividhā surā /
GSD37gautdhcu:1257: yathaivaikā tathā sarvā na pātavyā dvijottamaiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1285: ācāryaṃ caiva tatputraṃ tadbhāryāṃ dīkṣitaṃ gurum /
GSD37gautdhcu:1286: pitaraṃ ca pitṛvyaṃ ca mātaraṃ mātulaṃ tathā //
GSD37gautdhcu:1287: hitaiṣiṇaṃ ca vidvāṃsaṃ śvaśuraṃ patimeva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1288: na brūyānnāmato vidvān mātuśca bhaginīṃ tathā //
GSD37gautdhcu:1289: yadi brūyāttu taṃ dhyātvā namaskṛtvā vadedatha //
GSD37gautdhcu:1293: śreyān hitaiṣī vayasā ca vṛddha iti draṣṭavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1300: etāni vihāya tyaktvā pratiśravaṇaṃ prativacanaṃ dadyādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1302: adṛṣṭena guruṇā ājñāyāṃ dīyamānāyāṃ abhikramaṇaṃ tadabhimukhena gamanaṃ kuryādityarthaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1304: yadā guruḥ adho nīcaiḥ tiṣṭhet āsīta vā,
GSD37gautdhcu:1309: kūpasthitaṃ guruṃ dṛṣṭvā taṭākasthaṃ tathaiva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1313: evaṃ sūtrārthaśca tadānīṃ draṣṭavyaḥ adhaḥsthānāsanatiryagvātasevāyāmuttiṣṭhet apayāyācca krameṇeti tatrādhaḥsthānāsane dṛṣṭvottiṣṭhet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1318: tena anuktamapi samuccīyate āsīnaṃ dṛṣṭvā uttiṣṭhet śayānaṃ dṛṣṭvā'sīteti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1323: yadasya karma kartavyaṃ tatkaromītyācāryasya vijñāpya tatkṛtvā kṛtamityākhyāya tiṣṭhet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1339: tasya yau savarṇau sadṛśau bhāryāputrau tayorapi priyahitayoryuktaḥsyāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1347: tathācāpastambaḥ-'proṣito bhaikṣādagnau kṛtvā bhuñjīta bhaikṣaṃ haviṣā saṃstutaṃ
GSD37gautdhcu:1348: tatrācāryo devatārtha āhavanīyārthe ca taṃ bhojayitvā yaducchiṣṭaṃ prāśnāti havirucchaṣṭameva tat'; ityādi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1360: yuvatīnāṃ taruṇīnāṃ viproṣyāpi na kāryamityeke manyante na tu
GSD37gautdhcu:1377: na cānāpadyapi brahmacāriṇaḥ śūdrābhyanujñānamanena kalpayituṃ yuktaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1382: tasmādanāpadyeva brahmacāriṇaḥ apraśastadvijātiprāpaṇārthoyamārambhaḥ apraśastānāmaviśeṣeṇa prāptau satyāṃ 'abhiśastapatitavarjaṃ';
GSD37gautdhcu:1384: itarathā śūdraprāpaṇe sati abhiśastādīnāṃ prāptyabhāvādeva pratiṣedho na yujyata iti na ca śakyate vaktuṃ śūdraviṣaya evāyamapavāda iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:1385: yatra hi dvijātayaḥ praśastā adhikriyante tatra śūdro 'pi praśasta eveti itarasya prasaṅga eva nāstīti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1386: tena prathamakalpastāvat brahmacāriṇaḥ praśastebhya eva bhaikṣacaraṇaṃ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1394: varṇagrahaṇaṃ śūdrasyāpi prāpaṇārthaṃ asati varṇagrahaṇe sarvagrahaṇaṃ tayoreva syāditi tadarthaṃ varṇagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1396: tataśca śūdrasyāpi vṛttihīnasya bhikṣācaraṇe na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1402: kecitsarveṣu varṇeṣu bhavaṃ sārvavarṇikamiti vigrahaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ sarvaśabdasya prayojanaṃ na vidmaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1406: dvipadasya bhikṣāṃ dehīti śabdasya prārthanāyāṃ dehītyasyāpi ca sārmathyāt prāptasyādau brāhmaṇena bhavacchabdaḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1409: bhavacchabdasya prātipadikatvātkevalasya ca prayogābhāvāt strīṇāṃ sakāśe tadāmantritavibhaktyantaḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1414: yathāha gṛhyasmṛtiḥ 'brāhmaṇo bhikṣeta bhavati bhikṣāṃ dehīti,
GSD37gautdhcu:1417: kṣāṃ ca hiṃ ca na vardhayet'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1434: teṣāṃ yo yaḥ prathamanirdiṣṭaḥ tatra tatra pariharet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1435: anyatrālābhe pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ parihṛtyāpi teṣāmeva sakāśe
GSD37gautdhcu:1441: idaṃ bhaikṣamiti gurave kathayitvā tato bhuṃkṣveti tenānujñāto bhuñjīta /
GSD37gautdhcu:1471: tathaiva manurapi mekhalādibhiḥ saha pratipattividhānāt brahmacāriṇaḥ kamaṇḍaludhāraṇaṃ jñāpayati-
GSD37gautdhcu:1480: apsu pāṇau ca kāṣṭhe ca kalpitaḥ pāvakaḥ śuciḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1484: idānīṃ yadi brahmacārī guroḥ samyagvinayenāvatiṣṭheta tadānīṃ kiṃ kartavyamityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1489: adhikārādeva siddhe śiṣyagrahaṇamanyasyāpi śāsanīyasya bhāryāputrāderayameva dharma iti jñāpanārtham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1505: sarveṣu vedeṣu yāvataiva kālenādhyayanamabhinirvartayet tāvantameva kālaṃ brahmacaryaṃ caret tasya tadarthatvāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1506: sarvagrahaṇaṃ yadyekamadhīyīta yadi vā dvau yadi vā sarvānityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1508: vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākramam //
GSD37gautdhcu:1515: gururācāryaḥ arthena prayojanena nimantryaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ kiṃ gurvarthe karavāṇīti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1520: tena vā alaṃ gurudakṣiṇayetyanujñātasya snānaṃ samāvṛttiḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1521: idānīṃ pitrādyanekagurusannidhāne kaḥ prathamaḥ pūjya ityata āha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1524: sa śreṣṭhaḥ pradhāno gurūṇāṃ anyeṣāṃ pitrādīnām /
GSD37gautdhcu:1538: yadi pitaivācāryo bhavati tadā pitā viśiṣyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1543: ityatra pitṛśabdena pitaivācāryo yo bhavati sa eva gṛhyata iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1550: vedānadhītya vedau vā vedaṃ vāpi yathākramam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1560: evaṃ hi smṛtyantaraṃ pratibhāti-“eṣa vo 'bhihito dharmo brāhmaṇasya caturvidhaḥ“iti,
GSD37gautdhcu:1561: tatra brāhmaṇasyaivāyaṃ caturvidho dharmaḥ itarayorekavidha ityāśaṅkā syāditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1562: tarhi tatkathamiti cet tatra brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1563: tatkathaṃ gamyata iti cet trayāṇāmeva varṇānāṃ catvāra āśramā iti smṛtyantaradarśanāt /
GSD37gautdhcu:1564: tathā cāpastambaḥ-“sarveṣāmupanayanaprabhṛti samānamācāryakule vāsaḥ sarveṣāmanūtsargo vidyāyā buddhvā karmāṇi yatkāmayettadārabheta“iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1569: tathā ca śrutiḥ-“trayo dharmaskandhā yajño 'dhyayanaṃ dānamiti prathamastapa eva dvitīyastṛtīyamācāryakule vasanametānāruhya brahmalokaṃ gacchati brahmasaṃstho 'mṛtatvameti“iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1582: tathā jābālaśrutāvapi tulyaphalataiva śrūyate-'brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gṛhī bhavet /
GSD37gautdhcu:1585: yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet gṛhādvā vanādvā brahmalokaṃ gacchati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1591: āpastambopyāha-'catvāra āśramā gārhasthyamācāryakule vasanaṃ maunaṃ vānapraśthyāmiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1592: teṣu sarveṣu yathopadeśamavyagraṃ vartamānaḥ kṣemaṃ gacchati'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1595: ucyate- yo yasyānuṣṭhāne samarthaḥ tasya tadāśramapratipattyarthaṃ itarāśramavidhānamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1599: evaṃ gṛhīte vyutthānaśrutirapyupapadyate-'evaṃ vai tamātmānaṃ viditvā putreṣaṇāyāśca vitteṣaṇāyāśca lokeṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1600: itarathā hi bhikṣācaryamiti saṃnyāsopadeśo nopapadyata iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1608: tataśca padārtho 'pyevaṃ grahītavyaḥ-gṛhastho jāyamānaḥ pūrvavāsanayā gārhasthyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1610: tribhiḥ ṝṇaiḥ sambadhyate-yajñena devebhya ṝṇī bhavatyato yajñaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1612: brahmacaryeṇa ṝṣibhyaḥ ataḥ parvādau brahmacaryarakṣaṇaṃ kartavyamiti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1624: brahmalokaprāpterapi samuccayaphalatvenopadiṣṭatvāt jābālaśrutāvapi prādhānyena pūrvaṃ samuccayapakṣasyaivābhihitatvāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:1627: āpastambavākye 'pi teṣu sarveṣviti bahuvacanāt- naikasminneva vartamānaḥ kiṃ tu sarveṣveva vartamāna ityabhiprāyeṇoktatvāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:1630: yāvajjīvaśruterapi“gṛhī vanaṃ praviśedyadi gṛhameva kāmayeta tadā yāvajjīvasagnihotraṃ juhuyāt“iti jābālaśrutivākye anityatvadarśanāt,
GSD37gautdhcu:1636: asamartho yaḥ samuccayānuṣṭhāne andhapaṅgutvādidoṣeṇa niḥsvatvādinā vā tena vikalpapakṣo 'pyāśrayaṇīyaḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa bruvata ityarthasiddhasyāpyupanyāsaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:1640: tasminnutpanne yatra kvāpyāśrame sthitasya puruṣārthaḥ sidhyatīti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1649: vikhanasā proktaṃ śāstraṃ vaikhānasaṃ tadvidhinā vartata iti vaikhānasaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1656: nanu ca smṛtyantare vaikhānasamabhidhāya bhikṣurityuktaḥ iha kimarthaṃ kramabheda iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1667: iti smṛtyantaramavalambya gārhasthyādeva saṃnyāsaḥ kartavya ityevamarthaḥ kramabheda iti varṇayanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1674: evaṃ ca vaikhānasasya sapatnīkatvapakṣe 'pi brahmacaryarakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1676: grahaṇaṃ gṛhasthotpannānāmeva teṣāṃ dharme ādhikāra ityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1680: iti teṣāṃ gṛhastha eva yonirityukte evakārādevetareṣāṃ brahmacaryarakṣaṇe siddhe evamabhidhānameṣāṃ punarnivṛttirmā bhūditi /
GSD37gautdhcu:1681: yadi te gārhasthyaṃ prati nivṛtti bhaveyuḥ tadā te caṇḍālā bhavanti kutaḥ ?
GSD37gautdhcu:1684: pratyavasitāḥ pratinivṛttāḥ ye parivrājakatāpasāḥ naiṣṭhikavaikhānasāḥ tasmātteṣāṃ jātānyapatyāni caṇḍālaiḥsahavāsayedrājā grāmo vetyarthaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:1685: idānīmāśramadharmeṣu krameṇa vaktavyeṣu prāpteṣu sarvāśramasāmyādupakurvāṇasya pūrvamuktvā naiṣṭhikasya krameṇa prāptaṃ vaktumāha-
GSD37gautdhcu:1688: nanu ca naiṣṭikasyaivedaṃ nopakurvāṇasyeti kathaṃ jñāyata iti ?
GSD37gautdhcu:1692: tarhi brahmacārigrahaṇaṃ kimartamiti cet yenopakurvāṇavratamanuṣṭhitaṃ tasyaiva
GSD37gautdhcu:1700: evaṃ ca japa evāsya viśiṣṭaṃ dharmasādhanamiti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1701: ācārya iti prakṛte gurugrahaṇaṃ mātāpitrorapi śuśrūṣāprāpaṇārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1703: teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ śuśrūṣā paramaṃ tapa ucyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1718: evaṃ yathopadeśaṃ vartamāno brahmalokaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānamavāpnoti sa cejjitendriyo bhavati /
GSD37gautdhcu:1721: śrutvā spṛṣṭvā ca dṛṣṭvā ca bhuktvā ghrātvā ca yo nara /
GSD37gautdhcu:1722: na hṛṣyati glāyati vā sa vijñeyo jitendriyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1727: yadbrahmacāriṇa uktaṃ taduttareṣāmapi bhavati yadaviruddhaṃ dyūtādivarjanam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1731: caśabdaḥ uttarasya yadvakṣyamāṇaṃ tadapyaviruddhaṃ pūrveṣāmapi bhavatīti jñāpayati,
GSD37gautdhcu:1737: tasyābhidhīyamānāḥ dharmāḥ aviruddhāḥ kecitkathaṃ nāma pūrveṣāṃ syuriti tadarthaṃ vyutkrameṇābhidhānam /
GSD37gautdhcu:1743: nanu ca nityasyaiva tyāgo yuktaḥ upavītaśabdena nyāsaviśeṣo 'bhidhīyate-
GSD37gautdhcu:1748: na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅge na cele na tripuṣkare //
GSD37gautdhcu:1749: nāgāre nāsane nānne yasya syānmokṣavittu saḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1754: ucyate-prathamaṃ tāvadyaduktaṃ yajñādhikārābhāvāt iti tatra yāgaśabdo devapūjanādāvapi vartate devapūjanaṃ tvasya dhyānena paramātmapūjanāmastyeva kutaḥ ?
GSD37gautdhcu:1759: śabdādayo hotā etai ṛtvigbhistena sruveṇa taddhaviraharaharyatinā paramātmanyagnau hotavyam'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1762: iti tatrāpi kuṇḍikādīnāṃ vaicitryavarjanārthaḥ saṅgasyaiva parityāgaḥ,
GSD37gautdhcu:1768: iti sarvāśramādhikārāt sāmānyatvena vartamāno 'pi viśeṣadharmeṇa bādhyata iti cet, na,
GSD37gautdhcu:1772: iti nirdeśaḥ sarvāśramādhikāranivṛttyartha iti jñātuṃ śakyate /
GSD37gautdhcu:1773: tatastatra sarvāśramādhikārābhāvāt pūrvāparavirodhaprasaṅgo mā bhūditi 'na kuṇḍyāṃ nodake saṅgaḥ';
GSD37gautdhcu:1774: iti saṅgamātrasyaiva tyāgaḥ kriyata iti grahītuṃ śakyata eveti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1776: tasmāttenāpi na kuṇḍyādīnāṃ tyāgaḥ yaccoktam-'nakhāni nikṛtya yajñopavītaṃ visṛjya';
GSD37gautdhcu:1777: iti tatrāpi prathamaṃ saṃnyāsāśramapraveśakāle purāṇasya yajñopavītasya tyāgamātraṃ kriyate,
GSD37gautdhcu:1779: kutaḥ ? 'nakhāni nikṛtya purāṇaṃ vastraṃ yajñopavītaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ tyaktvā navāni gṛhītvā'śramaṃ praviśet';
GSD37gautdhcu:1789: yuṣmākaṃ tu yajñopavītaṃ tyaktavyamiti vacanābhāvāddoṣa eveti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1790: bhikṣuranicaya iti vaktavye dharmāsyādāvabhidhānaṃ nityasyāgnihotradārāderapi tyāgārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1791: evaṃ ca gārhasthyādeva yaḥ pravrajet tena śrautasya ca smārtasya cāgneḥ dāraputraprapañcayajñādisahitasya tyāgaḥ
GSD37gautdhcu:1793: vaisānasādeva yaḥ pravrajet tatrāpi sapatnīkapakṣe prāptasya dārasya śrāmaṇakāgnisahitasya pañcayajñāderapi tyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ //
GSD37gautdhcu:1797: iti japasyaiva pradhānatvenopadiṣṭatvāt tenaivāgniparigrahāderapyabhāvo jñātuṃ śakyata eveti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1800: ityanena brahmacāriṇaḥ uktena brahmacaryarakṣaṇenāsyāpi siddherūrdhvaretograhaṇaṃ yathā yathā retasaḥ kṣayo bhavati tathā tathopāyaḥ kartavya ityevamartham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1813: varṣāsviti bahuvacanāt grāmādgrāmāntaraṃ caturṣu māseṣu na gacchedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1816: tathāca smṛtyantaram- 'grāmānte devagṛhe śūnyāgāre vṛkṣamūle vā'; iti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1822: tadarthaṃ grāmaṃ gacchet arthāccheṣaṃ kālamaraṇye devāyatanādau tiṣṭhediti siddham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1830: anivṛttaṃ yasmin gṛhe pratyākhyātaṃ tasmindine tadgrahaṃ punarna praviśedityarthaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1832: yathā'ha vasiṣṭhaḥ-'vidhūme sannamusale ekaśāṭhīparihito 'jinena vā'; iti //
GSD37gautdhcu:1844: dharmayogaṃ pathipraśnaṃ svādhyāyaṃ ca tathaiva ca /
GSD37gautdhcu:1853: ityanena sarvasyaipacayikadravyasya parityāge sati pratiprasavaḥ kriyate-
GSD37gautdhcu:1863: eke manyante pratigrahadoṣaparihārārthaṃ prahīṇaṃ yadrathyādau tyaktaṃ tatprakṣālya paridadhyāt nirṇijyeti pratyātmikaśaucaprāpaṇārtham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1870: cet, tatra jaṅgamavadha eva hiṃseti kecidvadanti /
GSD37gautdhcu:1876: apagate ṛtau dvitīyāṃ rātriṃ grāme na vaset /
GSD37gautdhcu:1879: apartugrahaṇādvarṣāsu kadācit dvitīyāmapi vasato na doṣaḥ /
GSD37gautdhcu:1881: tataśca tasminvarṣākāle ekatraiva vasedanyatra na vasedityarthasiddham //
GSD37gautdhcu:1886: bījānāṃ vrīhyādīnāṃ vadhaṃ avahananādi na kuryāt //
GSD37gautdhcu:1927: ākrāmediti siddhe adhitiṣṭhediti vacanaṃ pramādādākramato doṣābhāvajñāpanārtham /
GSD37gautdhcu:1946: aikāśramyaṃ tvācāryaḥ pratyakṣavidhānāt gārhasthasya gārhasthasya // Gaut_3.36 //
